description: In order to use IPv6, you currently have to install an IPv4 block along with the IPv6 block.  We need to have the option of spinning up an instance with IPv4 only, IPv6 only, or dual stack.  When adding a network block, the different versions should be added independently.
title: IPv6 currently requires IPv4 addresses to be present of faked out
